oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for purchase of farm equipment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt for payment on farm equipment purchased by Confederate veteran David Dotson of Grainger County from the McCormick Harvesting Machine Company in Rutledge, Tenn. Dotson served in Co. K, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA and lost part of his foot at the Battle of Franklin, Tennessee on Nov. 30, 1864. To see his shoe see (Davi108).
